segments.text: Say , Anna , what are you doing tonight ? Would you like to go out ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , sorry , I can't . I'm going to work late tonight . I have to finish this report .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , how about tomorrow night ? Are you doing anything then ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I'm not . What are you planning to do ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm going to see a musical . Would you like to come ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , I'd love to ! But let me pay for the tickets this time . It's my turn .
segments.speaker: S2
